action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix. The first column is entirely filled with Xs. The first row is entirely filled with Xs. The second row has one X at the beginning, followed by four empty squares (▢). The third row has two Xs at the beginning, followed by three empty squares. The fourth row has one X at the beginning, followed by four empty squares. The fifth row has one X at the beginning, followed by four empty squares.
